verses.verse: אֵיכָ֣ה ׀ <S%H349><s%> how יָשְׁבָ֣ה <S%H3427><s%> sit בָדָ֗ד <S%H910><s%> solitary הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> How doth the city רַבָּ֣תִי <S%H7227><s%> [that was] full עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of people הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has become כְּאַלְמָנָ֑ה <S%H490><s%> [how] is she become as a widow רַבָּ֣תִי <S%H7227><s%> she [that was] great בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations שָׂרָ֙תִי֙ <S%H8282><s%> [and] princess בַּמְּדִינ֔וֹת <S%H4082><s%> among the provinces הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לָמַֽס׃ <S%H4522><s%> [how] is she become tributary ס

בָּכ֨וֹ <S%H1058><s%> She weepeth תִבְכֶּ֜ה <S%H1058><s%> sore בַּלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night וְדִמְעָתָהּ֙ <S%H1832><s%> and her tears עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> are on לֶֽחֱיָ֔הּ <S%H3895><s%> [are] on her cheeks אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> has לָ֥הּ מְנַחֵ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> she hath none to comfort מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> among all her lovers כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רֵעֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H7453><s%> [her] all her friends בָּ֣גְדוּ <S%H898><s%> have dealt treacherously בָ֔הּ הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> have become לָ֖הּ לְאֹיְבִֽים׃ <S%H341><s%> with her they are become her enemies ס

גָּֽלְתָ֨ה <S%H1540><s%> is gone into captivity יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah מֵעֹ֙נִי֙ <S%H6040><s%> because of affliction וּמֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> and because of great עֲבֹדָ֔ה <S%H5656><s%> servitude הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> She יָשְׁבָ֣ה <S%H3427><s%> she dwelleth בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no מָצְאָ֖ה <S%H4672><s%> she findeth מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4494><s%> no rest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רֹדְפֶ֥יהָ <S%H7291><s%> all her persecutors הִשִּׂיג֖וּהָ <S%H5381><s%> overtook בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> the midst הַמְּצָרִֽים׃ <S%H4712><s%> her between the straits ס

דַּרְכֵ֨י <S%H1870><s%> The ways צִיּ֜וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion אֲבֵל֗וֹת <S%H57><s%> do mourn מִבְּלִי֙ <S%H1097><s%> no בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> because none come מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> to the solemn feasts כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שְׁעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8179><s%> all her gates שֽׁוֹמֵמִ֔ין <S%H8074><s%> are desolate כֹּהֲנֶ֖יהָ <S%H3548><s%> her priests נֶאֱנָחִ֑ים <S%H584><s%> sigh בְּתוּלֹתֶ֥יהָ <S%H1330><s%> her virgins נּוּג֖וֹת <S%H3013><s%> are afflicted וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> herself מַר־ <S%H4751><s%> angry לָֽהּ׃ ס

הָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become צָרֶ֤יהָ <S%H6862><s%> Her adversaries לְרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> are the chief אֹיְבֶ֣יהָ <S%H341><s%> her enemies שָׁל֔וּ <S%H7951><s%> prosper כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD הוֹגָ֖הּ <S%H3013><s%> hath afflicted עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> Because רֹב־ <S%H7230><s%> her for the multitude פְּשָׁעֶ֑יהָ <S%H6588><s%> of her transgressions עוֹלָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5768><s%> her children הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> are gone שְׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> the enemy ס

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> is departed [מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בת־ כ] (מִבַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H1323><s%> And from the daughter ק) כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הֲדָרָ֑הּ <S%H1926><s%> all her beauty הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become שָׂרֶ֗יהָ <S%H8269><s%> her princes כְּאַיָּלִים֙ <S%H354><s%> are become like harts לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> [that] find מִרְעֶ֔ה <S%H4829><s%> no pasture וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> have fled בְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without כֹ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> without strength לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before רוֹדֵֽף׃ <S%H7291><s%> the pursuer ס

זָֽכְרָ֣ה <S%H2142><s%> remembered יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> in the days עָנְיָהּ֙ <S%H6040><s%> of her affliction וּמְרוּדֶ֔יהָ <S%H4788><s%> and of her miseries כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲמֻדֶ֔יהָ <S%H4262><s%> all her pleasant things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> were from מִ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> that she had in the days קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old בִּנְפֹ֧ל <S%H5307><s%> fell עַמָּ֣הּ <S%H5971><s%> when her people בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand צָ֗ר <S%H6862><s%> of the enemy וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> and no עוֹזֵר֙ <S%H5826><s%> and none did help לָ֔הּ רָא֣וּהָ <S%H7200><s%> saw צָרִ֔ים <S%H6862><s%> her the adversaries שָׂחֲק֖וּ <S%H7832><s%> her [and] did mock עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> at מִשְׁבַּתֶּֽהָ׃ <S%H4868><s%> at her sabbaths ס

חֵ֤טְא <S%H2399><s%> hath grievously חָֽטְאָה֙ <S%H2398><s%> sinned יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לְנִידָ֣ה <S%H5206><s%> therefore she is removed הָיָ֑תָה <S%H1961><s%> has become כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְכַבְּדֶ֤יהָ <S%H3513><s%> all that honoured הִזִּיל֙וּהָ֙ <S%H2107><s%> her despise כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> her Because רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> her because they have seen עֶרְוָתָ֔הּ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> herself נֶאֶנְחָ֖ה <S%H584><s%> yea she sigheth וַתָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and turneth אָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> backward ס

טֻמְאָתָ֣הּ <S%H2932><s%> Her filthiness בְּשׁוּלֶ֗יהָ <S%H7757><s%> [is] in her skirts לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not זָֽכְרָה֙ <S%H2142><s%> she remembereth אַחֲרִיתָ֔הּ <S%H319><s%> not her last end וַתֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> therefore she came down פְּלָאִ֔ים <S%H6382><s%> wonderfully אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has מְנַחֵ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> she had no comforter לָ֑הּ רְאֵ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> behold יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָנְיִ֔י <S%H6040><s%> my affliction כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִגְדִּ֖יל <S%H1431><s%> hath magnified אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> for the enemy ס

יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand פָּ֣רַשׂ <S%H6566><s%> hath spread out צָ֔ר <S%H6862><s%> The adversary עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲמַדֶּ֑יהָ <S%H4261><s%> upon all her pleasant things כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָאֲתָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> for she hath seen גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> [that] the heathen בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> entered מִקְדָּשָׁ֔הּ <S%H4720><s%> into her sanctuary אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom צִוִּ֔יתָה <S%H6680><s%> whom thou didst command לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> should not יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> [that] they should not enter בַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> into thy congregation לָֽךְ׃ ס

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עַמָּ֤הּ <S%H5971><s%> All her people נֶאֱנָחִים֙ <S%H584><s%> sigh מְבַקְּשִׁ֣ים <S%H1245><s%> they seek לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread נָתְנ֧וּ <S%H5414><s%> they have given [מַחֲמֹודֵּיהֶם כ] (מַחֲמַדֵּיהֶ֛ם <S%H4262><s%> pleasant thing ק) בְּאֹ֖כֶל <S%H400><s%> for meat לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> to relieve נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul רְאֵ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> see יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וְֽהַבִּ֔יטָה <S%H5027><s%> and consider כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> I am זוֹלֵלָֽה׃ <S%H2151><s%> for I am become vile ס

ל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> nothing אֲלֵיכֶם֮ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹ֣בְרֵי <S%H5674><s%> [Is it] nothing to you all ye that pass דֶרֶךְ֒ <S%H1870><s%> along הַבִּ֣יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> behold וּרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if there be מַכְאוֹב֙ <S%H4341><s%> any sorrow כְּמַכְאֹבִ֔י <S%H4341><s%> like unto my sorrow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Which עוֹלַ֖ל <S%H5953><s%> which is done לִ֑י אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> Which הוֹגָ֣ה <S%H3013><s%> hath afflicted יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto me wherewith the LORD בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [me] in the day חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> of his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> anger ס

מִמָּר֛וֹם <S%H4791><s%> From above שָֽׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> hath he sent אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire בְּעַצְמֹתַ֖י <S%H6106><s%> into my bones וַיִּרְדֶּ֑נָּה <S%H7287><s%> and it prevaileth פָּרַ֨שׂ <S%H6566><s%> against them he hath spread רֶ֤שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> a net לְרַגְלַי֙ <S%H7272><s%> for my feet הֱשִׁיבַ֣נִי <S%H7725><s%> he hath turned אָח֔וֹר <S%H268><s%> me back נְתָנַ֙נִי֙ <S%H5414><s%> he hath made שֹֽׁמֵמָ֔ה <S%H8076><s%> desolate כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day דָּוָֽה׃ <S%H1739><s%> [and] faint ס

נִשְׂקַד֩ <S%H8244><s%> is bound עֹ֨ל <S%H5923><s%> The yoke פְּשָׁעַ֜י <S%H6588><s%> of my transgressions בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> by his hand יִשְׂתָּ֥רְג֛וּ <S%H8276><s%> they are wreathed עָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> [and] come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon צַוָּארִ֖י <S%H6677><s%> upon my neck הִכְשִׁ֣יל <S%H3782><s%> to fall כֹּחִ֑י <S%H3581><s%> he hath made my strength נְתָנַ֣נִי <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> the Lord בִּידֵ֖י <S%H3027><s%> me into [their] hands לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> am not אוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> [from whom] I am not able קֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> to rise up ס

סִלָּ֨ה <S%H5541><s%> hath trodden under foot כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַבִּירַ֤י ׀ <S%H47><s%> all my mighty אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> The Lord בְּקִרְבִּ֔י <S%H7130><s%> [men] in the midst קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> of me he hath called עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> against מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> an assembly לִשְׁבֹּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> against me to crush בַּחוּרָ֑י <S%H970><s%> my young men גַּ֚ת <S%H1660><s%> [as] in a winepress דָּרַ֣ךְ <S%H1869><s%> hath trodden אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> the Lord לִבְתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> the virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah ס

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> these אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I בוֹכִיָּ֗ה <S%H1058><s%> For these [things] I weep עֵינִ֤י ׀ <S%H5869><s%> mine eye עֵינִי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eye יֹ֣רְדָה <S%H3381><s%> runneth down מַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because רָחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> is far מִמֶּ֛נִּי <S%H4480><s%> is a מְנַחֵ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> because the comforter מֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> that should relieve נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָנַי֙ <S%H1121><s%> from me my children שֽׁוֹמֵמִ֔ים <S%H8074><s%> are desolate כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because גָבַ֖ר <S%H1396><s%> prevailed אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> because the enemy ס

פֵּֽרְשָׂ֨ה <S%H6566><s%> spreadeth forth צִיּ֜וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion בְּיָדֶ֗יהָ <S%H3027><s%> her hands אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> There מְנַחֵם֙ <S%H5162><s%> [and there is] none to comfort לָ֔הּ צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> her the LORD לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> concerning Jacob סְבִיבָ֣יו <S%H5439><s%> [should be] round about צָרָ֑יו <S%H6862><s%> [that] his adversaries הָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> has become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> him Jerusalem לְנִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> is as a menstruous woman בֵּינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> among ס

צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> is righteous ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for פִ֣יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> against his commandment מָרִ֑יתִי <S%H4784><s%> for I have rebelled שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> hear נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [עַמִּים כ] (הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> folk ק) וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and behold מַכְאֹבִ֔י <S%H4341><s%> my sorrow בְּתוּלֹתַ֥י <S%H1330><s%> my virgins וּבַחוּרַ֖י <S%H970><s%> and my young men הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> are gone בַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> into captivity ס

קָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called לַֽמְאַהֲבַי֙ <S%H157><s%> for my lovers הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like רִמּ֔וּנִי <S%H7411><s%> [but] they deceived כֹּהֲנַ֥י <S%H3548><s%> me my priests וּזְקֵנַ֖י <S%H2205><s%> and mine elders בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city גָּוָ֑עוּ <S%H1478><s%> gave up the ghost כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> While בִקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> while they sought אֹ֙כֶל֙ <S%H400><s%> their meat לָ֔מוֹ וְיָשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> to relieve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> their souls ס
